text: Ashoka Law College is a private law school situated at Manke Talab, Lakhanpur, Kathua in the Indian union territory of Jammu and Kashmir. It offers undergraduate 3 years law courses, 5 Year Integrated LL.B. courses, approved by Bar Council of India (BCI), New Delhi and affiliated to University of Jammu. ==History== In the year of 2004, the Ashoka Educational Trust Training and Research Institute established the Ashoka Law College at Kathua. ==References== Category:Educational institutions established in 2004 Category:2004 establishments in India Category:Law schools in Jammu and Kashmir
title: Ashoka Law College
